verses.text_ar: وَٱلذَّٰرِيَـٰتِ ذَرْوًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: By those that winnow with a winnowing

verses.text_ar: فَٱلْحَـٰمِلَـٰتِ وِقْرًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: And those that bear the burden (of the rain)

verses.text_ar: فَٱلْجَـٰرِيَـٰتِ يُسْرًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: And those that glide with ease (upon the sea)

verses.text_ar: فَٱلْمُقَسِّمَـٰتِ أَمْرًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: And those who distribute (blessings) by command,

verses.text_ar: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! that wherewith ye are threatened is indeed true,

verses.text_ar: وَإِنَّ ٱلدِّينَ لَوَٰقِعٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And lo! the judgment will indeed befall.

verses.text_ar: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْحُبُكِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: By the heaven full of paths,

verses.text_ar: إِنَّكُمْ لَفِى قَوْلٍ مُّخْتَلِفٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! ye, forsooth, are of various opinion (concerning the truth).

verses.text_ar: يُؤْفَكُ عَنْهُ مَنْ أُفِكَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: He is made to turn away from it who is (himself) averse.

verses.text_ar: قُتِلَ ٱلْخَرَّٰصُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Accursed be the conjecturers

verses.text_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى غَمْرَةٍ سَاهُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Who are careless in an abyss!

verses.text_ar: يَسْـَٔلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: They ask: When is the Day of Judgment?

verses.text_ar: يَوْمَ هُمْ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ يُفْتَنُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: (It is) the day when they will be tormented at the Fire,

verses.text_ar: ذُوقُوا۟ فِتْنَتَكُمْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: (And it will be said unto them): Taste your torment (which ye inflicted). This is what ye sought to hasten.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! those who keep from evil will dwell amid gardens and watersprings,

verses.text_ar: ءَاخِذِينَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحْسِنِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Taking that which their Lord giveth them; for lo! aforetime they were doers of good;

verses.text_ar: كَانُوا۟ قَلِيلًا مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ مَا يَهْجَعُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: They used to sleep but little of the night,

verses.text_ar: وَبِٱلْأَسْحَارِ هُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And ere the dawning of each day would seek forgiveness,

verses.text_ar: وَفِىٓ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ حَقٌّ لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلْمَحْرُومِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And in their wealth the beggar and the outcast had due share.

verses.text_ar: وَفِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ءَايَـٰتٌ لِّلْمُوقِنِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And in the earth are portents for those whose faith is sure.

verses.text_ar: وَفِىٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And (also) in yourselves. Can ye then not see?

verses.text_ar: وَفِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزْقُكُمْ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And in the heaven is your providence and that which ye are promised;

verses.text_ar: فَوَرَبِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقٌّ مِّثْلَ مَآ أَنَّكُمْ تَنطِقُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And by the Lord of the heavens and the earth, it is the truth, even as (it is true) that ye speak.

verses.text_ar: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيْفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Hath the story of Abraham´s honoured guests reached thee (O Muhammad)?

verses.text_ar: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمًا ۖ قَالَ سَلَـٰمٌ قَوْمٌ مُّنكَرُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: When they came in unto him and said: Peace! he answered, Peace! (and thought): Folk unknown (to me).

verses.text_ar: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجْلٍ سَمِينٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Then he went apart unto his housefolk so that they brought a fatted calf;

verses.text_ar: فَقَرَّبَهُۥٓ إِلَيْهِمْ قَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And he set it before them, saying: Will ye not eat?

verses.text_ar: فَأَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيفَةً ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَـٰمٍ عَلِيمٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Then he conceived a fear of them. They said: Fear not! and gave him tidings of (the birth of) a wise son.

verses.text_ar: فَأَقْبَلَتِ ٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ فِى صَرَّةٍ فَصَكَّتْ وَجْهَهَا وَقَالَتْ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Then his wife came forward, making moan, and smote her face, and cried: A barren old woman!

verses.text_ar: قَالُوا۟ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: They said: Even so saith thy Lord. Lo! He is the Wise, the Knower.

verses.text_ar: ۞ قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: (Abraham) said: And (afterward) what is your errand, O ye sent (from Allah)?

verses.text_ar: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: They said: Lo! we are sent unto a guilty folk,

verses.text_ar: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّن طِينٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: That we may send upon them stones of clay,

verses.text_ar: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Marked by thy Lord for (the destruction of) the wanton.

verses.text_ar: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Then we brought forth such believers as were there.

verses.text_ar: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍ مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: But We found there but one house of those surrendered (to Allah).

verses.text_ar: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةً لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And We left behind therein a portent for those who fear a painful doom.

verses.text_ar: وَفِى مُوسَىٰٓ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And in Moses (too, there is a portent) when We sent him unto Pharaoh with clear warrant,

verses.text_ar: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكْنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَـٰحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: But he withdrew (confiding) in his might, and said: A wizard or a madman.

verses.text_ar: فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: So We seized him and his hosts and flung them in the sea, for he was reprobate.

verses.text_ar: وَفِى عَادٍ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلْعَقِيمَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And in (the tribe of) A´ad (there is a portent) when we sent the fatal wind against them.

verses.text_ar: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَىْءٍ أَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: It spared naught that it reached, but made it (all) as dust.

verses.text_ar: وَفِى ثَمُودَ إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And in (the tribe of) Thamud (there is a portent) when it was told them: Take your ease awhile.

verses.text_ar: فَعَتَوْا۟ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: But they rebelled against their Lord´s decree, and so the thunderbolt overtook them even while they gazed;

verses.text_ar: فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مِن قِيَامٍ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنتَصِرِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And they were unable to rise up, nor could they help themselves.

verses.text_ar: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا فَـٰسِقِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And the folk of Noah aforetime. Lo! they were licentious folk.

verses.text_ar: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا بِأَيْي۟دٍ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: We have built the heaven with might, and We it is Who make the vast extent (thereof).

verses.text_ar: وَٱلْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَـٰهَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْمَـٰهِدُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And the earth have We laid out, how gracious is the Spreader (thereof)!

verses.text_ar: وَمِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And all things We have created by pairs, that haply ye may reflect.

verses.text_ar: فَفِرُّوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Therefor flee unto Allah; lo! I am a plain warner unto you from him.

verses.text_ar: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And set not any other god along with Allah; lo! I am a plain warner unto you from Him.

verses.text_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا۟ سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Even so there came no messenger unto those before them but they said: A wizard or a madman!

verses.text_ar: أَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِهِۦ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Have they handed down (the saying) as an heirloom one unto another? Nay, but they are froward folk.

verses.text_ar: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِمَلُومٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: So withdraw from them (O Muhammad), for thou art in no wise blameworthy,

verses.text_ar: وَذَكِّرْ فَإِنَّ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ تَنفَعُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And warn, for warning profiteth believers.

verses.text_ar: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ ٱلْجِنَّ وَٱلْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: I created the jinn and humankind only that they might worship Me.

verses.text_ar: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنْهُم مِّن رِّزْقٍ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطْعِمُونِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: I seek no livelihood from them, nor do I ask that they should feed Me.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلْقُوَّةِ ٱلْمَتِينُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! Allah! He it is that giveth livelihood, the Lord of unbreakable might.

verses.text_ar: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ذَنُوبًا مِّثْلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصْحَـٰبِهِمْ فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And lo! for those who (now) do wrong there is an evil day like unto the evil day (which came for) their likes (of old); so let them not ask Me to hasten on (that day).

verses.text_ar: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن يَوْمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And woe unto those who disbelieve, from (that) their day which they are promised.
